content: It is not specified in the incident ticket provided whether the UPS batteries were involved in the incident. The incident seems to involve multiple alerts related to host and application issues such as connectivity problems, response time degradation, and pool unavailability. The affected hosts are identified as srv01-nas, srv05-nas, and srv02-nas, and the applications include Apache Web Server https-pol-api-umg, Node Status and Agent Status. The location is identified as Nashville Studio - Commerce St. The probable root cause could be any number of issues such as hardware failure, network connectivity problems, or software bugs.
